snippet: President Juan Manuel Santos appeared to open a window this week to a bilateral cease-fire with the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia.
abstract: Colombian Pres Juan Manuel Santos appears to be seeking bilateral cease-fire with rebel group Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia, or FARC, by saying two groups are trying to find way to tamp down conflict.
lead_paragraph: President Juan Manuel Santos appeared to open a window this week to a bilateral cease-fire with the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia.

headline.main: Colombia: President Hints at Shift on a Cease-Fire
headline.print_headline: Colombia: President Hints at Shift on a Cease-Fire
